title: AI Developer
description:
CoreSync AI is Hiring an AI Developer (Full-Time)

CoreSync AI, a Tokyo-based tech firm, develops AI solutions for clients in finance, healthcare, and retail. We’re seeking a skilled AI Developer to join our team and build innovative AI models.

About the Role
You’ll design and deploy AI applications that enhance client operations, working with data scientists and engineers to deliver cutting-edge solutions.

Your Responsibilities

  • Develop AI models using TensorFlow or PyTorch.
    - Collaborate with teams to refine algorithms.
    - Integrate AI solutions with client systems.
    - Optimize model performance and accuracy.
    - Document solutions for client use.
    - Conduct performance testing to ensure reliability.
    - Stay informed about AI advancements.
    - Support client training on AI tools.
    - Contribute to AI strategy development.
    - Participate in code reviews and best practices.

Qualifications Required
Candidates should have 3–5 years of experience in AI or machine learning, with proficiency in TensorFlow, PyTorch, or Python. Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure) and strong problem-solving skills are essential. A Bachelor’s degree in computer science or a related field is required.

Why CoreSync?
We’re a team of innovators pushing the boundaries of AI. Our hybrid work environment offers flexibility, and we provide continuous learning opportunities through certifications and conferences. You’ll work on impactful projects in a collaborative, supportive culture.

Perks
- Health insurance
- Commuter allowance
- 20 days of annual leave
- AI certification budget
- Access to AI tools
- Team-building events

Apply Today
Join CoreSync AI and shape the future of AI. Submit your application now!

#CoreSyncCareers #AIDevelopment #HiringNow
